column1: Your coupon has been added successfully.
column2: Your coupon has been added successfully.

column1: Your coupon has been edit successfully.

column1: If your coupon requires a coupon code for redemption, then please add it here. (Note: Coupon code should be in between 4 and 16 characters in length and can contain alphabets, numbers, or a combination of both. Special characters other than hyphen (-) are not allowed.)
column2: If your coupon requires a coupon code for redemption, then please add it here. (Note: Coupon code should be in between 4 and 16 characters in length and can contain alphabets, numbers, or a combination of both. Special characters other than hyphen (-) are not allowed.)

column1: To make this coupon more relevant for users and to mention its terms and conditions, enter its description. Terms and conditions can contain information such as coupon code used by staff at the store etc.
column2: To make this coupon more relevant for users and to mention its terms and conditions, enter its description. Terms and conditions can contain information such as coupon code used by staff at the Showroom etc.

column1: Enter your coupon's details below, click 'Preview' to view your coupon.
column2: Enter your coupon's details below, click 'Preview' to view your coupon.

column1: Enter the maximum number of times this coupon can be claimed by members. (Enter 0 for unlimited. Note: You will not be able to edit claims once this coupon expires.)
column2: Enter the maximum number of times this coupon can be claimed by members. (Enter 0 for unlimited. Note: You will not be able to edit claims once this coupon expires.)

column1: Enter your coupon's details below, then click 'Add coupon' to publish it on your Store.
column2: Enter your coupon's details below, then click 'Add coupon' to publish it on your Showroom.

column1: Never. This coupon does not have an end date.
column2: Never. This coupon does not have an end date.

column1: This coupon ends on a specific date. (Select the date by clicking on the calendar icon below.)
column2: This coupon ends on a specific date. (Select the date by clicking on the calendar icon below.)

column1: End coupon on a specific date.
column2: End coupon on a specific date.

column1: Select a date by clicking on the calendar icon below.
column2: Select a date by clicking on the calendar icon below.

column1: Edit your coupon's details below, then click 'Save Changes' to publish it on your Store.
column2: Edit your coupon's details below, then click 'Save Changes' to publish it on your Showroom.

column1: This widget forms the coupons tab on the Store Profile and displays the coupons of the Store. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Store Profile.
column2: This widget forms the coupons tab on the Showroom Profile and displays the coupons of the Showroom. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Showroom Profile.

column1: Displays list of latest store coupons on the site.
column2: Displays list of latest Showroom coupons on the site.

column1: Displays list of hot store coupons on the site.
column2: Displays list of hot Showroom coupons on the site.

column1: Displays the list of coupons from Stores created on your community. This widget should be placed in the widgetized Store coupons store. Results from the Search Store coupons form are also shown here.
column2: Displays the list of coupons from Showrooms created on your community. This widget should be placed in the widgetized Showroom coupons Showroom. Results from the Search Showroom coupons form are also shown here.

column1: Displays the Store coupons based on their ending dates, in 3 tabs: ‘This Week’, ‘This Month’ and ‘Overall’. Users can see more coupons right within that widget. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.
column2: Displays the Showroom coupons based on their ending dates, in 3 tabs: ‘This Week’, ‘This Month’ and ‘Overall’. Users can see more coupons right within that widget. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.

column1: Displays the form for searching Store coupons on the basis of various filters. You can edit the fields to be available in this form.
column2: Displays the form for searching Showroom coupons on the basis of various filters. You can edit the fields to be available in this form.

column1: Choose the fields that you want to be available in the Search Store coupons form widget.
column2: Choose the fields that you want to be available in the Search Showroom coupons form widget.

column1: Displays the coupons from Paid Stores. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.
column2: Displays the coupons from Paid Showrooms. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.

column1: Forms the coupons tab of your Store and shows coupons and deals of your Store. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Store Profile.
column2: Forms the coupons tab of your Showroom and shows coupons and deals of your Showroom. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Showroom Profile.

column1: {item:$subject} added a new coupon in the store {item:$object}:
column2: {item:$subject} added a new coupon in the Showroom {item:$object}:

column1: Are you sure you want to make this coupon as featured? Only one coupon can be made featured, and this coupon will then be shown alongside your Store\'s entry in the listing of all Stores of this community. It will also be shown on top of all your coupons on your Store profile.
column2: Are you sure you want to make this coupon as featured? Only one coupon can be made featured, and this coupon will then be shown alongside your Showroom\'s entry in the listing of all Showrooms of this community. It will also be shown on top of all your coupons on your Showroom profile.

column1: You can add attractive coupons for your store and Store by clicking on the "Add an coupon" link. These coupons will appear on your Store profile. You can also select a featured coupon for your Store below, which will be shown alongside your Store's entry in the listing of all Stores of this community, and will also be shown on top of all your coupons.
column2: You can add attractive coupons for your Showroom and Showroom by clicking on the "Add an coupon" link. These coupons will appear on your Showroom profile. You can also select a featured coupon for your Showroom below, which will be shown alongside your Showroom's entry in the listing of all Showrooms of this community, and will also be shown on top of all your coupons.

column1: No coupons have been added in this Store yet.
column2: No coupons have been added in this Showroom yet.

column1: Click %1$shere%2$s to create the first coupon of this store.
column2: Click %1$shere%2$s to create the first coupon of this Showroom.

column1: Are you sure that you want to delete this coupon? It will not be recoverable after being deleted.
column2: Are you sure that you want to delete this coupon? It will not be recoverable after being deleted.

column1: Are you sure you want to make this coupon as featured? Only one coupon can be made featured, and this coupon will then be shown alongside your Store's entry in the listing of all Stores of this community. It will also be shown on top of all your coupons on your Store profile.
column2: Are you sure you want to make this coupon as featured? Only one coupon can be made featured, and this coupon will then be shown alongside your Showroom's entry in the listing of all Showrooms of this community. It will also be shown on top of all your coupons on your Showroom profile.
This is the email that gets sent to Showroom admins as coupon claim from the site.

column2: Displays list of coupons of Paid Showrooms on the site. This widget should be placed on Showrooms coupon.

column1: Select the default ordering for coupons to be listed on Store coupon.
column2: Select the default ordering for coupons to be listed on Showroom coupon.

column1: How many store coupons will be shown per store on Stores coupon
column2: How many Showroom coupons will be shown per Showroom on Showrooms coupon

column1: You can add attractive coupons for your store and Page by clicking on the "Add an coupon" link. These coupons will appear on your Page profile. You can also select a featured coupon for your Page below, which will be shown alongside your Page's entry in the listing of all Pages of this community, and will also be shown on top of all your coupons.
column2: You can add attractive coupons for your Showroom and Page by clicking on the "Add an coupon" link. These coupons will appear on your Page profile. You can also select a featured coupon for your Page below, which will be shown alongside your Page's entry in the listing of all Pages of this community, and will also be shown on top of all your coupons.

column1: The total amount that must reached before the coupon is valid. (Enter 0 or Leave Empty in case you want coupon to be applied on all amounts.)
column2: The total amount that must reached before the coupon is valid. (Enter 0 or Leave Empty in case you want coupon to be applied on all amounts.)

column1: Enter the minimum quantity of the products that must be available in the cart for coupon to be applied. (Enter 0 or Leave Empty in case you want coupon to be applied on any quantity of products.)
column2: Enter the minimum quantity of the products that must be available in the cart for coupon to be applied. (Enter 0 or Leave Empty in case you want coupon to be applied on any quantity of products.)

column2: Enter the maximum number of times the coupon can be used by a single user. (Leave empty or Enter 0 for unlimited. Note: You will not be able to edit this field once this coupon expires.)
